about_the_game:
Embark on a harrowing journey of violent paranoia and schizophrenic delusion in Soul Roach City, the worst city in the world—a decaying urban nightmare where gangs rule, and the streets are flooded with drugs, smut, and despair. Thrust into a brutal, action-packed FPS horror experience, confront horrific realities and twisted delusions of guilt and suffering as you struggle to discern what’s real from the nightmares that haunt your mind. Are you ready to face the truth?

Key Features:

  • Roguelike Perma-Death FPS: Every run is unique, with high stakes and no second chances.

  • Cigarette-Based Health System: Stay alive by strategically managing your health in a grim, unconventional way.

  • Projectile-Based Bullet System: Experience satisfying, skill-driven combat where every bullet counts.

  • Diverse Enemies: Battle brutal gangs and surreal, drug-induced visions in a city gone mad.

  • Multiple Stages of Descent: Progress deeper into the decaying nightmare of Soul Roach City.

  • Unique Perks Every Run: Customize your playstyle with perks that make each run a new experience.

  • Discover Each Characters Harrowing Past: Unravel the tragic journey into madness of each playable character that led to this point.

  • Explore the Rich Lore: Dive deep into the twisted and haunting history of Soul Roach City.

  • Classic FPS-Inspired Movement System: Master air-strafing, bunnyhopping, and more for high-speed, skill-based traversal.

content_descriptors.notes: Violence and Drug use reference, Suicide reference

Thrust into a brutal, action-packed FPS horror experience, confront horrific realities and twisted delusions of guilt and suffering as you struggle to discern what’s real from the nightmares that haunt your mind. name: Soul Roach City

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 6-core processor with a base clock of at least 2.8 GHz.
  • Graphics: Supports DirectX Raytracing (DXR) and has at least 6 GB VRAM.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-12700K / AMD Ryzen 7 5800X.
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 / AMD Radeon RX 6900 XT

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Temas sensíveis
Drogas ilícitas

short_description: Dive into Soul Roach City, the worst city in the world, in this brutal roguelike FPS horror. Battle gangs and drug-fueled visions, uncover each characters tragic past, and explore the city's twisted lore in a harrowing descent into madness. Are you ready?
